summary: Merge of many ClefJ Mods to save Plugin space
descriptionHtml:
[left][font=Tahoma]
I represent to ﻿you, a Merge from ClefJs amazing Mod Collection!
To save myself Plugin space I cam up with this Idea and thanks to ClefJ, I can share it with you all.


[b]:Information:[/b]

I don't know anything about City building, so if there's any issue like missing textures or NPC problem, I can't really help you.
I did clean the Mod/s with TES5Edit.
So far I did not run into any Minor problems myself.


[b]:About the Mods:[/b]
Most Infos you'll find on the Mod pages!

[/font][font=Tahoma][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73430]Left Hand Crossing[/url]﻿ - ([/font][font=Tahoma][color=#ff0000]Incompatible[/color] with Silverstead), [color=#b6d7a8]Player home[/color]
[/font][font=Tahoma][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77508]ClefJ's Karthwasten-Experimental[/url]﻿ - [/font][font=Tahoma]No requirements, [color=#b6d7a8]Player home[/color]
[/font][font=Tahoma][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75416]ClefJ's Rorikstead[/url]﻿ - [/font][font=Tahoma][color=#ff0000]Incompatible[/color] with any major exterior mod to Rorikstead, [color=#b6d7a8]Player home[/color]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74454]ClefJ's Dragon Bridge[/url]﻿ - [color=#ff0000]Incompatible[/color] with mods that change the exterior of Dragon Bridge, [color=#b6d7a8]Player home[/color]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73872]Anga's Mill-ClefJ Edition[/url]﻿ - [color=#ff0000]Incompatible[/color] with any mod that might modify the immediate region of Anga's Mill
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71135]ClefJ's Half-Moon Mill[/url]﻿ - Certainly [color=#ff0000]Not Compatible[/color] with major town modifications in this zone, including the lovely Wolvenna's Half-Moon Vampire Town. 
- Certain player homes are compatible, such as those outside the creek's bridge, like Half-Moon Chalet. [color=#b6d7a8]Player home[/color]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69652]Diamond Bluff Settlement[/url]﻿ - [color=#ff0000]Incompatible[/color] with any mod that might modify the exterior of the Solitude Lighthouse are, [color=#b6d7a8]Player home[/color]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68436]ClefJ's Shor's Stone[/url]﻿ -  [color=#ff0000]Incompatible[/color] with anything that modifying the Shor's Stone cells might be hurtful, as the walls made encompass the whole town, [color=#b6d7a8]Player home[/color]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66425]ClefJ's Darkwater Crossing[/url]﻿ - [color=#ff0000]Known Conflicts[/color] with Mods that edit the cells immediately around Darkwater Crossing, such as the Fort Darkwater file
- Some clipping with the carriage from Better Fast Travel
- The quest/spell mod Spectraverse has a location dependency that this town blocks. Turning the mod on/off to complete this part of Spectraverse solved it for me, [color=#b6d7a8]Player home[/color]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64284]Kynesgrove and Heldenloft[/url]﻿ -[color=#ff0000] Incompatible[/color] with Nernies Village and Town Expansion, along with other mods that modify Kynesgrove, I imagine won't work so well with this unfortunately. There is a dungeon work in progess in the Steamscorch Mine, but it isn't connected atm and should be revisited later. [color=#b6d7a8]Player home [/color]


[b]:[/b][b]Requirements:[/b]

All DLC's, many of his Mods use at least one DLC


[b]:Credits:[/b]

Full credits to ClefJ
thanks to matortheeternal for Merge Plugins
Skyrim by Bethesda[/font][/left]
author: Darnexx and ClefJ
